Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Rogue[/b] | Attacking creatures you control with first strike have double strike.
[b]Warrior[/b] | {2}: This creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
